title: Review: 2022 Zipp 404 Firecrest are deep aero wheels for all, plus Actual Weights
content:
The all-new Zipp 404 Firecrest are a bit of a surprise in that they feel, in all the right ways, like a much shallower wheel where it counts. Yet, they have the deep aero shape that some racers want. Which means, as much as I hate to say it, they kinda hit that sweet spot [â€¦]

The post Review: 2022 Zipp 404 Firecrest are deep aero wheels for all, plus Actual Weights appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
